rules_text:
Equipped creature gets +10/+10.
Equip–Tap any number of untapped creatures you control other than target creature with total power 10 or greater.
flavor_text: [i]“It's time to rid us of this threat once and for all. Blatz, hand me my ax. Ratlo, my cannon. Gromp, be a doll and strap on my fire barrel!”[/i]
